name: Bulbasaur
descriptions: While it is young, it uses the nutrients that are stored in the seed on its back in order to grow.
There is a plant seed on its back right from the day this Pokémon is born. The seed slowly grows larger.

name: Ivysaur
descriptions: Exposure to sunlight adds to its strength. Sunlight also makes the bud on its back grow larger.
When the bulb on its back grows large, it appears to lose the ability to stand on its hind legs.

name: Venusaur
descriptions: A bewitching aroma wafts from its flower. The fragrance becalms those engaged in a battle.
Its plant blooms when it is absorbing solar energy. It stays on the move to seek sunlight.

name: Charmander
descriptions: From the time it is born, a flame burns at the tip of its tail. Its life would end if the flame were to go out.
It has a preference for hot things. When it rains, steam is said to spout from the tip of its tail.

name: Charmeleon
descriptions: If it becomes agitated during battle, it spouts intense flames, incinerating its surroundings.
It has a barbaric nature. In battle, it whips its fiery tail around and slashes away with sharp claws.

name: Charizard
descriptions: It is said that Charizard’s fire burns hotter if it has experienced harsh battles.
It is said that Charizard’s fire burns hotter if it has experienced harsh battles.

name: Squirtle
descriptions: When it feels threatened, it draws its limbs inside its shell and sprays water from its mouth.
When it retracts its long neck into its shell, it squirts out water with vigorous force.

name: Wartortle
descriptions: It cleverly controls its furry ears and tail to maintain its balance while swimming.
It is recognized as a symbol of longevity. If its shell has algae on it, that Wartortle is very old.

name: Blastoise
descriptions: The rocket cannons on its shell fire jets of water capable of punching holes through thick steel.
It crushes its foe under its heavy body to cause fainting. In a pinch, it will withdraw inside its shell.

name: Mega Blastoise
descriptions: The cannon on its back is as powerful as a tank gun. Its tough legs and back enable it to withstand the recoil from firing the cannon.
The cannon on its back is as powerful as a tank gun. Its tough legs and back enable it to withstand the recoil from firing the cannon.

name: Gigantamax Blastoise
descriptions: Water fired from this Pokémon’s central main cannon has enough power to blast a hole into a mountain.
It’s not very good at precision shooting. When attacking, it just fires its 31 cannons over and over and over.
